amendment.description: Amendment requires that at least 33 percent of HIV/AIDS prevention funds be expended for abstinence-until-marriage programs.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 11 printed in House Report 108-80 would specify that of the amount set aside for HIV/AIDS prevention in bilateral assistance, 33% should go to abstinence-until-marr age programs.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Pitts amendment (A011) Agreed to by recorded vote: 220 - 197 (Roll no. 157).
